abstract: Davos participants like the economist Nouriel Roubini and Barry Silbert, chief executive of SecondMarket, share their views on issues like the lack of global leadership and why the I.P.O. market is languishing.
snippet: Davos participants like the economist Nouriel Roubini and Barry Silbert, chief executive of SecondMarket, share their views on issues like the lack of global leadership and why the I.P.O. market is languishing.
lead_paragraph: At the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, DealBook’s Andrew Ross Sorkin chatted with attendees like the economist Nouriel Roubini and Barry Silbert, chief executive of SecondMarket, about their thoughts on important issues raised at the conference.
